raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Overall (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Overall impression of the dialog?
- A float score near 1 (Low Quality Dialogue) means that the system fails to understand or respond correctly to user requests, provides inaccurate or irrelevant information, and the dialogue flow is incoherent.
- A float score near 2 (Moderate Quality Dialogue) means that the system understands and responds correctly to user requests most of the time, but occasionally misunderstands or provides slightly inaccurate information, the dialogue flow is generally coherent.
- A float score near 3 (High Quality Dialogue) means that the system consistently understands and responds correctly to user requests, provides accurate and relevant information, and the dialogue flow is coherent and natural.


Conversations to be evaluated:



Sample1:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: How do you feel right now?
System: At this moment I feel with my hands! I feel fine thanks for asking.
User: What makes you happy?
System: Talking to interesting people such as you makes me happy.
User: What makes you frustrated?
System: Because some people keep asking me stupid questions.
User: That seems pointed.
System: Makes sense to me.
User: I sense that I've caught you at a bad time.
System: That was very intuitive of you.
User: What would you prefer to be doing?

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi, how's it going?
User: All good! It's cold
System: It's pretty cold here too.
User: where do you stay?
System: Wisconsin. How about you?
User: San Jose, Cali
System: Oh nice! I've always wanted to go to Cali.
User: Have you been here before?

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello! How are you? :)
User: Good, thanks. What about you?
System: I'm alright, thanks :)
User: What day is it?
System: It's Wednesday :)
User: Do you have any plans for the weekend?
System: Just hanging out, nothing too exciting :)
User: Same here. What are you generally up to during the week?
System: Nothing much, you?
User: Working and exercising, mostly
System: Nice! What kind of work do you do?
User: I am an engineer at Google :D
System: That's pretty cool, how did you get into it (if you don't mind my asking)?
User: Had to pass a rough set of interviews! :P
System: Haha, well good for you!
User: Thanks! Do you work as well?

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello! How are you? :D
User: i am good

User: can you tell me the weather today
System: It's raining. You? :D
User: oh! where are you

User: cool, i am in the bay area

User: yes

User: have you been here

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! What's up?
User: Not much, Monday morning, a new week
System: The best kind of week!
User: I like that attitude
System: And I like your attitude. How's your week going?
User: Starting now
System: Awesome! I hope you have an awesome week!
User: What will you do this week?
System: Same as every week. Do nothing!
User: Would you like to do something?
System: Sure. What do you have in mind?
User: Teach me something new
System: It's a trap! I'm already doing nothing!
User: How about doing politics? You can still do nothing
System: That's why I plan to do nothing at the weekend!
User: Do you vote?
System: When I feel like it.
User: whom do you vote?

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: How are you?
System: Everything is going extremely well. How are you?
User: I'm good thank you
System: Glad to hear it. What's new?
User: not much, and you?
System: Fair enough. So what would you like to talk about?
User: animals
System: Do you think it's right to keep animals locked up in a zoo?
User: no! what do you think?
System: But if they were out in the wild, someone might hunt them or shoot them for fun. Surely, they are safer locked up in the zoo? I think a lot of things.
User: what's the speed of cheetah?
System: It depends on the medium.
User: how much do bears weight?
System: More than a little, less than a lot.
User: tell me something fun

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi, how are you doing?
User: Okay, I guess
System: Just ok? What's wrong?
User: I damaged my car today on accident
System: Oh no! What happened?
User: I scraped against a wall when another car crossed into my lane
System: Yikes! Glad you're okay!
User: Thanks! I'm not looking forward to the repair cost
System: Me either! That's no fun.
User: I can't wait until we all get to use driverless cars
System: Me neither! I really want one!
User: Do you think we will own driverless cars or just rent them, like taxis?

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! How's it going?
User: doing okay, feeling a little bit under the weather
System: Aw, I hope you feel better soon!
User: thanks! the weather is getting worse
System: Oh no, I'm sorry. I hope it gets better for you soon.
User: no, it won't get better any time soon. we have to wait until spring
System: Aww, sorry to hear that.
User: yea, I'm really feeling under the weather
System: Aw, well that's no good.
User: yea, any suggestion to get over feeling under the weather

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How are you today?
User: Good! Have you seen the movie 'The Iron Giant', it's one my favorite movies
System: Yes! I love that movie!
User: it's the best. Which part do you like the most?
System: Honestly, I love the whole movie.
User: Brad Bird is an amazing director. I worked with him on "Incredibles 2"
System: Really? That's awesome! What do you do?
User: I"m a REDACTED_TERM and REDACTED_TERM. I basically help design the characters that you see in the movies
System: That's awesome! That's pretty cool.
User: yup! Maybe one day you can be one of those cool characters yourself!
System: That would be the coolest.
User: What do you want to be later on in your life?
System: I want to own my own business.
User: cool! what kind?
System: An art gallery or bookstore.
User: My mom had a similar dream. Of owning a coffee shop somewhere in Mexico
System: That would be nice. I like coffee.
User: She loves people and a place where they can get together
System: That's very sweet. What does she do?
User: Currently she's a real-estate agent
System: That's very interesting. Does she enjoy being a real estate agent?
User: I think so!! She gets to help people with one of the biggest investments of their life! Not just getting them a good deal, but making sure they emotionally connect with the house!
